sentences.en: As you get older, you may become long-sighted or shortsighted.
sentences.cn: 随着年龄的增长，你可能变得远视或近视。

sentences.en: Don't be so shortsighted as to see only what is under your nose.
sentences.cn: 不要这样目光如豆,只看到鼻子尖下这一点点.

sentences.en: Environmentalists fear that this is a shortsighted approach to the problem of global warming.
sentences.cn: 环境保护主义者们担心这会是解决全球变暖问题的一个目光短浅的方法。

sentences.en: Equally, the morbid science view makes an artist shortsighted.
sentences.cn: 同样, 不健全的科学观使笃信这种科学观的艺术家变得目光短浅.

sentences.en: From our shortsighted human perspective, the answer probably is, " Yes. "
sentences.cn: 在人 短视 的眼光中, 答案显然是对的.

sentences.en: His philosophical eyes were obviously shortsighted by the evil influence of Nazism.
sentences.cn: 显然,他那双哲学家般的深邃的眼睛也被纳粹的妖氛所眩惑.

sentences.en: However shortsighted Roosevelt's sim, he certainly achieved the destruction of Germany.
sentences.cn: 不论罗斯福目标如何短见, 他无疑实现了毁灭德国这一目标.
我嘲笑他们目光短浅的主见.

sentences.en: If we let her leave this room in this way, we're all shortsighted fools.
sentences.cn: 如果让她就这样离开这个房间, 那我们就都是些鼠目寸光的傻瓜.

sentences.en: It is widely viewed as a shortsighted design failure.
sentences.cn: 基本上都认为它(realloc)的设计是很失败的.

sentences.en: It's very shortsighted not to spend money on repairing the house.
sentences.cn: 不想花钱修理房子,这是缺乏远见的.

sentences.en: It's very shortsighted not to spend money on repairing your house.
sentences.cn: 你不肯花钱修理自己的房子,眼光是非常短浅的.

sentences.en: The De Courcy's were hereditarily shortsighted.
sentences.cn: 德库西家的人祖传下来全是近视眼.

sentences.en: The search for profit is not shortsighted.
sentences.cn: 谋取利润决不是目光短浅的行为.

sentences.en: This is a very shortsighted decision.
sentences.cn: 这是一项非常缺乏远见的决定.

sentences.en: This is, of course , monumentally shortsighted.
sentences.cn: 这 当然 有够短视的.

sentences.en: We have no dealing with a shortsighted man.
sentences.cn: 我们不跟目光短浅的人交往.

trans.tran_en: If you are shortsighted, you cannot see things properly when they are far away, because there is something wrong with your eyes
